string.text: If you have empty leab boxes and non-boxed artefacts in your inventory, their radiation will be absorbed.\n Works with portable workshops.
Only When Workshop With Melter Is Opened?
Absorb radioation with empty lead boxes ONLY when workshop with melter is opened.
Opened Artifact Melter Absorbs All Radiation
All radiation will be absorbed when workshop with melter is in use. (Disregarding empty lead boxes)
